original_text: When Abner returned to Hebron, Joab met him at the city's gate. Then Joab took him into a corner, as if he wanted to speak with Abner alone. But he pushed his knife into Abner's stomach. Joab killed Abner because Abner had killed Asahel, Joab's brother.
korean_text: 아브넬이 헤브론으로 돌아오매 요압이 더불어 조용히 말하려는 듯이 그를 데리고 성문 안으로 들어가 거기서 배를 찔러 죽이니 이는 자기의 동생 아사헬의 피로 말미암음이더라

sentences.original_text: Joab met him at the city's gate
Then Joab took him into a corner
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 요압은 그를 구석으로 데려갔다

sentences.original_text: as if he wanted to speak with Abner alone
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 아브넬과 단둘이 이야기하고 싶은 것처럼

sentences.original_text: But he pushed his knife into Abner's stomach
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 칼을 아브넬의 배에 찔렀다
